text: John C. Gaunt (1833 - January 13, 1886)Find a Grave was an American soldier who fought in the American Civil War. Gaunt won the Medal of Honor, the highest award for bravery.He won the medal for his actions in the Battle of Franklin in Franklin, Tennessee on November 30, 1864. He was given the award on February 13, 1865. Gaunt was born in Columbiana County, Ohio. ==Medal of Honor citation== ==Related pages== * List of American Civil War Medal of Honor recipients: Gâ€“L ==References== Category:1833 births Category:1886 deaths Category:United States Army Medal of Honor recipients Category:Military people from Ohio
title: John C. Gaunt
